amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which provides for the sale of up to seven million barrels of oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 11, as amendment No. 41, that strikes a provision which provides for the sale of up to seven million barrels of oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schaefer amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 267 (Roll no. 517).
